66913.どこからか 声が聞こえてくる……。: I hear voices coming from somewhere...

66914.<center>余は 第７代ウルベア皇帝ボラングムニス。\nそなたは 王者の座を:
I am Borang Muniz, 7th Emperor of Urbea. You
are the one who aspires to Champ's Seat.

66915.<center>余は 三闘士のハンマーを\nつねに 手元に置くことで 守ってきた:
I have always protected the Triad Hammer by
keeping it close at hand. That's right. Even
now that I've passed away.

66916.<center>だが それも今日までのこと……。\n王者の座を目指せし者よ。\n:
But that was only until today... you who
aspire to Champ's Seat. I now bestow upon you
the Triad Hammer.

66918.<center>かつて 大いなる災いが この地を襲いし時\n我らドワーフの民は:
Once, when a great calamity struck our land,
our Dwarf people fought and died before other
species...

66919.<center>だが それは 無駄死にではない。\nドワーフたちの屍が築いた道は:
But it was not a death in vain. For the paths
that the corpses of the Dwarfs built
eventually became the paths of champions.

66920.<center>……これで 余の役目も終わった。\nウルベアの民の待つ場所へと還:
Now my work is done. I can return to the place
where the people of Urbea await me. Farewell.
Farewell, Champ's Seat.

66921.「おお <pc>よ。\n 三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士のオノを\n ついに その手:
Oh, <pc>. I see that you have at last
taken the Triad Hammer and the Triad Axe into
your hands.

66922.「……ほう。古代ウルベアの皇帝は\n 死後も 三闘士のハンマーを\n 守り続けて:
...Oh. I understand that the Emperor of
ancient Urbea kept the Triad Hammer even after
his death...

66923.「おお……今は亡き ウルベアの皇帝よ。\n そなたの思い。同じく国を治める者とし:
Oh ... now deceased Emperor of Urbea. Your
thoughts. As a man who ruled a country, I
understand your feelings...

66924.「……<pc>よ。\n じつは わしも ウルベアの皇帝と同じなのだ。:
<pc>. As a matter of fact, I am like
the Emperor of Urbea.

66925.「いずれ 災厄が 世界を襲ったとき\n 王者の座を目指す者が 三闘士の盾を求め\:
I grew up being told that when the time came for disaster to strike the world, those who sought Champ's Seat would arise to claim the
Triad Shield.

66926.「国王となったとき わしは 命に代えても\n この盾を守ると誓いを立て 以来\n:
When I became king, I swore an oath to protect
this shield even at the cost of my life, and I
have worn it ever since.

66927.「では <pc>よ。\n この三闘士の盾を そなたに授けようぞ！:
Then, <pc>. I bestow upon you this
Triad Shield!

66929.「三闘の神殿の入り口は ラニアッカ断層帯の\n オノの祭壇 ハンマーの祭壇 そし:
The entrance to the Triad Temple is said to be at the Triad Altar, surrounded by the Axe Altar, Hammer Altar, and Shield Altar in the
Raniakka Fault Zone.

66930.「三闘士の神器を持ち その祭壇を訪れれば\n 必ずや 三闘の神殿の入り口が開く！:
If you carry the 3 Battles Altar and visit it,
you will surely open the entrance to the Triad
Temple!

66931.「三闘士のハンマーと盾は 古代から伝わるもの。\n 時代を経て かなり 傷んでお:
Triad Hammer and Shield have been handed down
since ancient times. They have been damaged by
time. This will be the last of their kind.

66932.「見事 王者の盾を手に入れたならば\n わしのもとへ 戻ってきてほしい。\n 頼:
If you received the Sovereign's Shield with
distinction, come back to me. I ask you,
<pc>!

66934.<cs_pchero>の持っている\n三闘士のオノ 三闘士のハンマー 三闘士の盾:
The Triad Axe, Triad Hammer, and Triad Shield
held by <cs_pchero> began to shake as if in
resonance.

66935.三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士の盾は\nボロボロに 崩れ去ってしまった……。:
Triad Hammer and Triad Shield crumbled to
tatters...

66936.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armaments wrapped in light came down from the
heavens to <cs_pchero>.
